alert.note: Alert for Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County; Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 16 at 2:45AM PST until January 17 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 10 AM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches for valleys and 6 to 12 inches for mountains. Snow amounts across much of southeastern Elko county will be on the higher end of the snowfall ranges. * WHERE...Southeastern Elko County, Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range, Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County, Southwest Elko County and South Central Elko County. * WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 10 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County; Southwest Elko County
